page.title: 20SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: The scientists from the Commonwealth Agricultural Bureaux hope to move into the disused junior school of Carmel College.The section would be the Institute of Biological Control which would move from Ascot.By 1990 it is estimated that there would be 103 scientists and senior managers.Plus 75 support staff.{C.A.B.}would like to be in this location close to Oxford.If the buildings at Carmel College remain enpty they will deteriorate.Planners object because it would bring too many people and demand too many scarce homes.It is argued that C.A.B. could recruit up to 50 staff,clerical and support,locally.
